name: Saladstop
description: SaladStop! is an international brand which motto is Eat Wide Awake. Some of their initiatives for health, people and the planet include in-store Recycling bins, composting program, non-toxic detergents, BYO campaign, reusable containers, packaging made of recycled PET, water consumption & energy efficiency, etc. SaladStop! is an international brand which motto is Eat Wide Awake.
